name: Lost For Words (itch)
description:
Salutations there! A cute little sleepover with pretty pinks and the cutest little pixel girls...turns dark

Upon entering the adorable pixel 2-d slider game you'll uncover secrets and untold truths as you go through puzzle upon puzzle to find out what it going on behind the scenes. As you use the surrounding words to unlock the progress through.

Can you make it out alive? after all its just a sleepover right? Download Now!!

>>> 

Controls

_____

Movement comprises of A & D keys 

To Interact with objects press E

Move Objects and Words with your mouse
